title: Asian Stocks Fall, Following US Tech-Led Selloff: Markets Wrap
description: Most Asian stocks dropped after a tech selloff dragged down US benchmarks and saw a rotation into more economically sensitive industries.
content: Most Asian stocks dropped after a tech selloff dragged down US benchmarks and saw a rotation into more economically sensitive industries.
